attributes.action: ensure that m.p.'s to claim expenses via legistation using the same rules and reguilations as the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that all m.p.'s should have to comply with the same rules for providing expenses claim as the public. This is to include the same calculaions for business mileage claims, reciepts for all incured expenses and to provide detailed documentation for all money claimed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
